name: Cat Catch - In Spaaaaaace
description:
Cat Catch : In Spaaaaaaace

The Cat Daycare Spaceship is plummeting to Earth, and it's up to YOU to save the day! Use your Portal Net and Hoverboard to collect all the Cats and then escape back to the Pod, BEFORE ITS TOO LATE!

WASD - Move       Spacebar - Jump     Left Mouse Click - Use Net

Shift - Use HoverBoard        A,D or Mouse Horizontal Axis - Steer Hoverboard

Hope you have fun!
